name: Group 8 - College Adventure
description:
The goal of this game is to give the player a general idea of the struggles a typical college student would face while trying to graduate with a degree. As for the player, their goal is to graduate from college. There may be obstacles in the way of graduating, but it is nothing the player can’t get around.

There are 4 years of college the players must complete in the game. Each year will have events occurring in each semester. Every semester will start with a timed platforming level with item pick-ups that can either give positive or negative effects during the following semesters.
